\label{cli.signupsheets}

it's the {\Tt{}cli.signupsheets\nwendquote} module.

\section{Default arguments for matching courses and users}

The first argument we need is to identify a set of courses.
For this we might also have to identify a set of registers.
We'll use the argument and option defined in the {\Tt{}cli.courses\nwendquote} module.
We'll default to all courses ({\Tt{}.*\nwendquote}) in the register of the {\Tt{}mine\nwendquote} command.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{3}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-2Zb0Rn-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Zb0Rn-1}}}\moddef{argument for matching courses~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Zb0Rn-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}\\{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
course: Annotated[str, coursescli.course_arg_regex]
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}\\{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{4}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-4b5wkB-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-4b5wkB-1}}}\moddef{option for matching registers, default to mine~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-4b5wkB-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}\\{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
register: Annotated[str, coursescli.register_opt_regex] = coursescli.MINE
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}\\{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{5}\nwdocspar

Then we can create a list of course--configuration pairs like this.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{6}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-1}}}\moddef{set list \code{}courses\edoc{} to ((course, register), config)-pairs~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
registers = coursescli.registers_regex(register)
courses = \{course_reg: courseutils.get_course_config(*course_reg)
           for course_reg in coursescli.courses_regex(course, registers)\}
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-2}}\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{7}\nwdocspar

Now, if that list is empty, we have no courses, then we exit with a non-zero 
return code.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{8}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-2}}}\moddef{set list \code{}courses\edoc{} to ((course, register), config)-pairs~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
if not courses:
  sys.exit(1)
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{9}\nwdocspar

We also need a username.
We will default to the username of the logged in user.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{10}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-2RixzZ-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2RixzZ-1}}}\moddef{option for username to filter for~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2RixzZ-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
user: Annotated[str, username_opt] = default_username
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{11}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-1}}}\moddef{argument and option definitions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
try:
  default_username = os.environ["USER"]
except KeyError:
  default_username = None

username_opt = typer.Option(help="Username to filter sign-up sheet for, "
                                 "defaults to logged in user's username.")
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-2}}\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{12}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-1}}}\moddef{imports~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
import os
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-2}\\{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-3}}\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{13}\nwdocspar



\section{Teaching time totals for a course}

We provide a command {\Tt{}time\nwendquote} that summarizes the time spent on the course.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{14}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}}}\moddef{subcommands~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
@cli.command()
def time(\LA{}argument for matching courses~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Zb0Rn-1}}\RA{},
         \LA{}option for matching registers, default to mine~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-4b5wkB-1}}\RA{}):
  """
  Summarizes the time spent on teaching the course(s).
  """
  \LA{}set list \code{}courses\edoc{} to ((course, register), config)-pairs~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-1}}\RA{}

  booked = []
  for (course, register), config in courses.items():
    \LA{}add to \code{}booked\edoc{} from \code{}course\edoc{} in \code{}register\edoc{} using \code{}config\edoc{}~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-25sTg1-1}}\RA{}

  \LA{}print summary of \code{}booked\edoc{}~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Jo3mB-1}}\RA{}
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{15}\nwdocspar

To add the bookings of a course to {\Tt{}booked\nwendquote}, we simply get the URL of the 
sign-up sheet and read the bookings.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{16}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-25sTg1-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-25sTg1-1}}}\moddef{add to \code{}booked\edoc{} from \code{}course\edoc{} in \code{}register\edoc{} using \code{}config\edoc{}~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-25sTg1-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
url = config.get(SIGNUPSHEET_URL_PATH)
\LA{}convert \code{}url\edoc{} to Google Sheet CSV-export URL if necessary~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1WcITC-1}}\RA{}
booked += sheets.read_signup_sheet_from_url(url)
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{17}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-2}}}\moddef{imports~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-1}{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-3}\nwenddeflinemarkup
from nytid.signup import sheets
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{18}\nwdocspar

If it's a Google Sheets sharing URL, we want to convert it to the export-CSV 
URL.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{19}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-1WcITC-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1WcITC-1}}}\moddef{convert \code{}url\edoc{} to Google Sheet CSV-export URL if necessary~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1WcITC-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-25sTg1-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
if "docs.google.com" in url:
  url = sheets.google_sheet_to_csv_url(url)
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-25sTg1-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{20}\nwdocspar

Once we have {\Tt{}booked\nwendquote} we can start to compute summaries.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{21}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-2Jo3mB-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Jo3mB-1}}}\moddef{print summary of \code{}booked\edoc{}~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Jo3mB-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
h_per_student = hr.hours_per_student(booked)

for event, hours in h_per_student.items():
    print(f"\{event\}: \{to_hours(hours):.2f\} h/student")

print(f"Booked: \{to_hours(hr.total_hours(booked)):.2f\} h "
        f"(\{to_hours(hr.max_hours(booked)):.2f\} h)\\n")

print("# Amanuenser")

amanuensis = hr.compute_amanuensis_data(booked)

for user, data in amanuensis.items():
    if not user:
        continue
    print(f"\{user\}: \{data[2]:.2f\} h, "
          f"\{100*hr.compute_percentage(*data):.1f\}%: "
          f"\{data[0].format('YYYY-MM-DD')\}--\{data[1].format('YYYY-MM-DD')\}")

print()
print("# Hourly")

for user, hours in hr.hours_per_TA(booked).items():
  if not user or user in amanuensis:
      continue
  print(f"\{user\}: \{to_hours(hours):.2f\} h")
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{22}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-3}}}\moddef{imports~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Wn4uX-1n4S18-2}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
from nytid.signup import utils
from nytid.signup import hr
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{23}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-1}}}\moddef{helper functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup
def to_hours(td):
    return td.total_seconds()/60/60
\nwalsodefined{\\{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-2}}\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{24}\nwdocspar


\section{Staff booked on course}

We want a list of the usernames of who is booked on the course.
We'll simply read the sign-up sheet and extract all usernames.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{25}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-2}}}\moddef{subcommands~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Wn4uX-CyCSh-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
@cli.command()
def users(\LA{}argument for matching courses~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Zb0Rn-1}}\RA{},
          \LA{}option for matching registers, default to mine~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-4b5wkB-1}}\RA{}):
  """
  Prints the list of all usernames booked on the course.
  """
  \LA{}set list \code{}courses\edoc{} to ((course, register), config)-pairs~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-30HUkq-1}}\RA{}

  booked = []
  for (course, register), config in courses.items():
    \LA{}add to \code{}booked\edoc{} from \code{}course\edoc{} in \code{}register\edoc{} using \code{}config\edoc{}~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-25sTg1-1}}\RA{}

  for user in hr.hours_per_TA(booked):
    print(user)
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{26}\nwdocspar


\section{Amanuensis}

We want the have an amanuensis command that can generate employment info for an 
amanuensis.
We also want to automatically store the sessions that are included in that 
employment.
This way we can easily calculate what has changed later to track 
\enquote{\foreignlanguage{swedish}{mertid}}.
\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{27}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-2}}}\moddef{argument and option definitions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Wn4uX-2Ns6UP-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{28}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}}\moddef{amanuens.py~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-FgX7F-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
@cli.comand(name="amanuens")
def amanuens_cmd(\LA{}option for username to filter for~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2RixzZ-1}}\RA{},
                 \LA{}argument for matching courses~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-2Zb0Rn-1}}\RA{} = ".*",
                 \LA{}option for matching registers, default to mine~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-4b5wkB-1}}\RA{}):
  """
  Computes amanuensis data for a TA.
  """

if len(sys.argv) < 2:
    print(f"\{sys.argv[0]\}: requires argument 'username'",
          file=sys.stderr)
    print(f"\{sys.argv[0]\} <username> [<start date>]")
    sys.exit(1)
else:
    user = sys.argv[1]

if len(sys.argv) > 2:
    date = arrow.get(sys.argv[2])
else:
    date = None

booked = []

for course, url in SIGNUP.items():
    booked += sheets.read_signup_sheet_from_url(url)

amanuensis = hr.compute_amanuensis_data(booked,
                                        begin_date=date)
data = amanuensis[user]

#start, end = shift_dates_forward(data[0], data[1])
start = data[0]
end = data[1]

print(f"\{user\}: \{data[2]:.2f\} h, "
      f"\{round(100*hr.compute_percentage(*data))\}%: "
      f"\{start.format('YYYY-MM-DD')\}--\{end.format('YYYY-MM-DD')\}")

events = sheets.filter_events_by_TA(user, booked)
events = filter(lambda x: user in sheets.get_booked_TAs_from_csv(x)[0], booked)
events = list(map(lambda x: x[0:len(sheets.SIGNUP_SHEET_HEADER)] + [user], 
                  events))

for event, hours in hr.hours_per_event(events).items():
    print(f"\{event\}: \{to_hours(hours)\}")

print()

csvout = csv.writer(sys.stdout)

for event in events:
    csvout.writerow(event)
\nwnotused{amanuens.py}\nwendcode{}\nwbegincode{29}\sublabel{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-2}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-2}}}\moddef{helper functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW4Wn4uX-47YflN-1}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
def shift_dates_forward(start_date, end_date):
  """Takes dates and shifts them so that start_date is tomorrow."""
  now = arrow.now()
  today = arrow.Arrow(now.year, now.month, now.day,
                      hour=start_date.hour, minute=start_date.minute,
                      second=start_date.second)

  if start_date > today:
      return start_date, end_date

  diff = (today-start_date).days
  return start_date.shift(days=diff+1), end_date.shift(days=diff+1)
\nwused{\\{NW4Wn4uX-3C6uNN-1}}\nwendcode{}

\nwenddocs{}
